230952.「あのあと 池の底を あらためて さらったら\n トロッドの父の勲章が 見つかっ:
After that, I went back to the bottom of the pond and found Trod's father's medal. I'm going to give it to him
after I get the dirt off of it.

230954.「この 勇者の橋を 渡ったところが\n 勇者アルヴァンさまと 盟友カミルが守った:
Across this Bridge of Heroes is the
great Gran Zedora Castle, defended by
Hero Alvan and Ally Kamil!

230956.「神に仕える身で ありながら\n 魔物の企みに まんまと だまされ\n 信じるべ:
I am a servant of God, and yet I am so deceived by the monster's schemes that I doubt the ally I should believe in.
I am ashamed of myself. Oh, God. Have mercy on this foolish lamb.

230958.「もし 弟子の庭師が 生きておれば\n もっと早く 本物のヤスラム殿のご遺体が\:
If my apprentice gardener had lived, the real Lord Yaslam's body would have been found much sooner. Then both
Alvan and Kamil might not have been killed. I have made up my mind! I'm going back to being the castle
gardener! I'm going to give the flowerbeds and the pond a thorough tidy up so that nothing like this will
ever happen again!

230960.「王さまからの おふれは 聞いたけど\n まだ 半信半疑ですよ……。\n ……で:
I heard the King's announcement, but I'm still skeptical. But, you know, hearing the announcement reminded me
of the time when Alvan and Kamil went out together to defeat the Giga Clubber who had attacked Castle Town.
I remember how reliable Alvan and Kamil were when they defeated the Giga Clubber who attacked Castle Town with
just the two of them.

230962.「……おふれは 聞いている。\n ヤスラム殿に化けた 魔物にだまされ\n 盟友カ:
I have heard your message. How foolish I was to be deceived by the monster disguised as Lord Yaslam and to doubt
Ally Kamil. The people of this land, whose hearts have been sobered by the Demon King's endless warfare, have
lost the one thing they most needed to believe in.
